SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: UI
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Attention all units: A suspect in
the attempt on the president's life
is currently on the run.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This is Officer Franklyn. I've located an
individual that matches the suspect's
description. Pursuing on foot.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
This here's official police business,
darlin', so I'm gonna need you to
find a safe place to hide.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm Officer Franklyn.
And who are you, exactly?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
A fellow officer? Heck, is my face ever red!
I'm Officer Bonnie Blair—and that feller
there looks to be our suspect!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text: Why is he dressed so conspicuously? Was he trying to stand out after causing an incident?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.text: Reckon we'll have to ask him.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Capitol City Police Department! Freeze!
We have some questions for you!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_09.text:
He must have slipped away
through this manhole.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Yeah, I don't see no other option,
but I got no idea how he done it.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
And pretty high up, by the looks of it.
I mean, this sure ain't no manhole.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You there! What are you doing!?
This is a restricted... Hold on.
Is that you, Miss Franklyn?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Mind telling me why you're roaming
around the presidential grounds?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I'm Tristan Hernandez, head of the Presidential Security
Office. I've put in a request for a temporary transfer for you
from the CCPD, so you'll be reporting directly to me now.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It's an honor to work for a hero of the
Channel War, sir! My daddy always said
there'd be no Bonnie Blair if it weren't
for the actions of Major Tristan Hernandez.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Your father was a first-rate marine—and the
real heroes of that war were him and all the
other boots on the ground. Do I understand you
served with the marines as well, Sergeant?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Yessir. Three years' active duty
in the Grenil Archipelago before
joinin' up with the CCPD.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Three years in the Green Hells, eh?
People like you form the foundation of
our country, Sergeant, and I thank you
for your faithful service.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_110.text:
And you, Miss Franklyn.
I wasn't aware you'd joined the CCPD.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I'm the Chairman of the National Marksmanship
Competition Committee, and Miss Franklyn here
is a former university champion.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_140.text: Well, I'll be switched! Who knew?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Indeed. Now then, I want you two to focus
on getting yourselves relocated ASAP.
You'll have your orders after that.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Somebody pinch me, 'cause I ain't never
lived in such a swanky place before!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Two bedrooms, no less. It's certainly
different from the university dorms.
It makes me wonder what the Presidential
Security Office is going to ask of us.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Time for some girl talk, darlin'!
You got a squeeze or what?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_040.text:
Always assume folks are seein' and hearin'
everything we say, 'cause this place is
gonna have more bugs than moldy corn.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_050.text:
All right, just hold on.
You can't spring that on me and—

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_060.text:
Why, I bet you're just as good at stealin'
hearts as ya are at shootin' targets!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_070.text:
Just act natural; it'll look suspicious
if we're bein' overly cautious.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_090.text:
Well, hey there, fuzzy! I didn't know
ya had yourself a kitty, Formina.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_100.text: Me? I thought it was yours.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_110.text:
You're tellin' me some stray just
followed us here? Sorry, THREE strays?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_120.text:
Can we keep them? 
Is that all right?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_130.text:
Always better to ask forgiveness instead'a
permission! Also, I doubt we got a choice,
'cause these fellers don't seem interested
in leavin' anytime soon.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Do you think we can use that power
here in Capitol City, Bonnie?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_010.text: Only one way to find out.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_020.text:
I, uh, might feel a touch self-conscious doing
it right in the middle of the street, though?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Well then, just skedaddle off to
the side where folks can't see ya.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_040.text:
I can't tell if that's a serious suggestion
or a way to poke fun, but fine. I'll do it.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Looks like it leads to the elevator—
which means it wants us to head up
to the president's office, I guess?

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I have a bad feeling about this.
Maybe we shouldn't.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, we ain't gettin' to the president's
office if we don't—and it'd be a real
stain on our record if we cut and run
on our first dang day.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
No, you're right. I just...
Well, maybe I'm overthinking it.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Do you think we're really
being monitored, Bonnie?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Sure do. I also bet we got this transfer 'cause
it's easier to keep eyes on us around here.
I mean, what else could they want with
a couple'a rookie officers like us?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: UI
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Bonnie and Formina are police officers pursuing
information on the attempted assassination of
the President of the Union States.
In the course of their investigation, the pair find
themselves in another world, where they obtain
a mysterious triangular object before returning home.
Following this, the head of the Presidential Security Office
reassigns the two to work under his direct command.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: UI
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_06.text: Retrace the case from the start.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text: It seems our only choice is to follow this green line—although I don't much care for the way all of this seems to have already been decided for us.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Heck, that's every day on the battlefield.
Don't get to decide nothin' for yourself,
and all a body can do is accept it and do
what ya can to keep everyone alive.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.text:
Hey, I'm ain't tryin' to lecture ya here.
Heck, I wish things were different, but all
we can do is play that hand we got dealt,
which means seein' where that elevator goes.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.text:
I don't think I've ever met anyone as
tough as you, Bonnie. So if you say this
is the best way, I'll be right behind you.

SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Well now, I seem to recall a certain someone 
sayin' she didn't like everything bein' decided
for her! This here partnership ain't gonna work
if ya don't think for yourself, girl.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
First the triangle piece, and now a pedestal?
We're solving an honest-to-goodness puzzle
here, and it makes me curious as to what
the true nature of this Quisstatium is.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That man didn't strike me as a liar,
yet I'm also not sure we can trust
him completely in this matter.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_020.text:
I can't say boo about why them fellers want us
to gather up these little triangle thingamajigs,
but I also got a feelin' the president's life is
gonna be safer while we're doin' it.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Assuming they have a plan, I agree that's
likely—not that I intend to relax our guard.
So for the time being, I want the two of you
to focus on finding these puzzle pieces.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Understood. If I may ask, sir, has the
president been apprised of this?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
He is, of course, aware there was an attempt
on his life, but I've not yet disclosed the series
of events involving these artifacts.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Bit hard to walk up to the big man and
ask if he's a dang traitor, I guess.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Indeed. Right now, we lack the information
to make a judgment on the matter one way
or the other—so I'll be relying on the two
of you to secure it for us.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_080.text: We won't let you down, sir.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_000.text:
We'd considered the existence of worlds beyond
our own, but had no idea there was a group like
that waiting for us. It makes me curious as to how
Quisstatium might be linked to the president.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
I considered it—and given our history,
I might be able to get a straight answer.
But he could just as easily laugh me off—
and if he does that, the matter is closed.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Meanin' we gotta round up more intel so
you can come at him knowin' everything.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_CUT_000_050.text: We won't let you down, sir.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_000.text:
I investigated every angle that might possibly
tie the president to that triangle and came up
empty. I thought I'd at least find signs of a
high-level cover-up, but...nothing.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_010.text:
And this World Heritage Site...
Ah, right. The large triangle.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_020.text:
Did Kuis Statiam build that? 'Cause it sure
looks like somethin' an alien would make.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_030.text:
While it may seem far-fetched, we've kept the possibility that
it may be alien in origin in mind when analyzing it. But even
if aliens DID make a giant triangle for some reason, there's
no reason that would connect to the president somehow.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_CUT_000_040.text:
We'll continue our search for
the triangular artifacts, then.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I went back to look for the triangle shape and
found a secret society that used a similar symbol,
but I can't be sure it was Quisstatium and there
are no active associations that fit the bill either.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_010.text:
That may be, but this group wouldn't
be much of a secret society if we
could find them so easily.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_020.text:
You underestimate the intelligence capabilities
of the Union States, Officer Formina. No group
or individual can conceal their activities from
us once we turn our eye on them.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_CUT_000_040.text:
This place is becoming more
frightening by the day.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_000.text:
Are you obtaining these triangular
artifacts from individuals who are
agents of Quisstatium?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_010.text:
None were active agents so far as I could
tell, but I did get the sense they were
related somehow—members of the
same society, perhaps.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_020.text:
And do you believe they're acting under
orders to give you the pieces?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_030.text:
Most of the time we just stumble onto 'em.
That said, I ain't a gal who believes in
coincidence—so if I had to guess, I'd say
there's some feller pullin' the strings.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_CUT_000_040.text:
This group clearly wants you to find these things
for some reason. I'm launching an investigation
that includes the pair of you; it's possible you
had contact with Quisstatium without realizing it.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_000.text: Good work. Just one piece to go.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you, sir. So long as the rules don't
suddenly change, we should be able to fit
all the pieces together once we track down
the last artifact.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_020.text:
At which point, anything could happen.
Be careful, both of you.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_030.text:
We sure will be, sir. Also, what are your
orders for how to deal with Kuis Statiam
if they try to interfere?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_CUT_000_040.text:
I'll leave that to you. Just prioritize a return
to Capitol City so we can respond as necessary.
And whatever you do, don't take needless risks—
I want the both of you back here alive.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_000.text:
Just one piece to go. So long as the rules
don't suddenly change, we should be able
to fit all the pieces together once we
track down the last artifact.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_010.text:
Only one more strange world to explore?
Sorta brings a tear to your eye.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_040.text:
What the heck's going on here, Major!?
Don't tell me you're the one behind the
assassination attempt on the president!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_050.text:
Actually, I'm a member of Quisstatium—
as is the president himself.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_060.text:
I was surprised by the artifact—but when you got
the pedestal, I knew Quisstatium was involved.
I informed the president, and we decided to wait
and watch while you collected the other pieces.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_070.text:
Letting us seemingly roam free while
closely monitoring our actions the
entire time, in other words.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_080.text:
Ultimately this is about Quisstatium, not you.
Right now, things are quiet—but if anything
is going to happen, it will be when the final
piece is put in place.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_090.text:
If we stick the last piece in now,
I reckon it'll catch 'em all unawares.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_100.text:
But we have no idea if the chief
is telling us the truth or not.
This could ALL be a Quisstatium plot.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_110.text:
They may be aiming to make allies out of you, so you
dispatch myself and the president. It would keep their
existence secret, and since the election is soon,
the power vacuum would be minimal.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_120.text:
I'd rather muck out a stable than
join them Kuis Statiam fellers!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_130.text:
These people are careful above all else.
They must have an ace up their sleeve
they've yet to play.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_140.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_140.text:
Then why not leave the puzzle unfinished?
Wouldn't that buy us time?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_150.text:
If a new president is elected and comes under
their control, nothing will change from how it
is now. We need to eliminate their influence
while the current president remains in office.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_160.text: Which is why you agreed to join 'em.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_170.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_170.text: Do you think this will work, Bonnie?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_180.text:
Well, it's sure reckless as all get-out!
But we can't just be leavin' this to chance;
we gotta stop 'em before they pull off
whatever it is they're tryin' to pull.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_190.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_190.text:
Well, my mind's made up.
I know where I stand on this one.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_200.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_200.text:
You're strong as anything, Formina, but right
now I'm plumb scared. Sure, I survived the
Green Hells, but the thought of throwin' myself
into danger again makes me weak in the knees.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_210.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_210.text:
But I can't let ya take on this whole crazy
fight by yourself, so let's you and me go
take down a secret society!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_220.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_220.text:
I will support you as best as I can,
because that's the only way to ensure
the president's safety.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_230.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_CUT_000_230.text:
The Major got my daddy through all
sorts of scraps, and I know the man'll
do the same for us.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_000.text:
Officers Blair and Franklyn reporting, sir.
We've acquired all the pieces.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_010.text: Then it's time to solve the puzzle.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_000.text:
Dangit! This thing's got me more twisted
up than a roll of barbed wire!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_010.text:
We have to remain calm
and think this through.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_020.text:
I don't mean to doubt your abilities, but do
you mind if I take a crack at it? It drives me
up the wall to see people struggle with
things like puzzles and crosswords.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
This is...Capitol City? Ah. The fact you have
invited us of Quisstatium here suggests you
seek discussions aimed at rebuilding our
cooperative relationship.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm gonna need ya to explain
what ya mean by that, pardner.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
You promised to tell us everything,
so let's start there.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well—but let us keep this short.
Quisstatium has collaborators on a great
many worlds, a fact even you should
have figured out by now.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Your past presidents have also been members.
In fact, it might be more accurate to say
that your Union States were formed in
collaboration with our society.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Your nation has acquired technology from us that
led to it becoming the most powerful country in
your world. So though you name us as the enemy,
you've been benefiting from us all along.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
An overblown assessment of your own value;
this nation is built on its citizens. So while the
president recognizes the value you provide,
we will not tolerate excessive interference.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: Did you know about this, sir?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I did—and I also used you to get a better
handle on what Quisstatium was plotting,
an action for which I apologize.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Your presidential election is imminent, so we will
leave it to the winner to make the determination.
For such is the point of the democracy to which
your people cling, is it not?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
That ain't gonna happen, sweetie. The president
made his decision, so we're gonna stop you here
and now. It'll be a cold day in hell before you people
influence the election!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
How very belligerent of you! Though
I suppose such things are one of the 
virtues of your nation and its people,
which is why you're worth using.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
But we are Quisstatium, and we will see
your president's decision reversed!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Capitol City...? What's going on!?
Has the plan gone awry!?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
We're onto you, darlin'. Better just
reach for the sky and give it up now.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Ah, I see! Either the president or Hernandez
has placed some devilish ideas in your heads.
Those men have been deceiving you for years;
why would you trust anything they say?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
We'll decide who we trust, thanks.
In the meantime, I think it's time for
you Quisstatium people to leave our
world for good.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Ah, but if we leave, only the two of you will
ever know the truth! You can easily imagine
the fate which awaits you in that case, yes?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
So rather than suffering that cruel fate, why not
become our points of contact for the incoming
president? We have observed you in action,
and know you possess the skills to do so.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Be the deceivers rather than the deceived?
Is that really the extent of your philosophy?
What a pity. I was really hoping to hear
something more high-minded from you.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Formina, I just love you to pieces.
Ya said exactly what I wanted to say,
only with a buncha fancy-soundin' words.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Clearly we have no choice but to parley with
your next president directly—which makes the
entire lot of you completely expendable!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I owe the two of you an apology: We used
you and put you through no end of trouble,
which makes us no better than Quisstatium.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Heck, Major, we just did what we had to.
Ain't that right, Formina?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I still don't know why this fell to us,
but maybe we can just chalk it up to fate.
At any rate, we managed to get through it,
which means our mission is complete.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah. And this must be
Officers Blair and Franklyn.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_050.text:
People like you are the bedrock of our nation's
strength and the sole reason for its happiness.
But because we cannot make your deeds public,
permit me to thank you on behalf of the people.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, guess that means we're back
to bein' plain old officers tomorrow.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_070.text:
What's wrong there, darlin'?
You look troubled.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_080.text:
...I'm not going back to the job, Bonnie.
I'm going back to university.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I was never interested in government or
politics, but this has made me think about
what responsibility really means—so I'm going
to dedicate myself to figuring that out.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I'd love to try goin' to university, but I ain't got
the money. Guess I could just go back to the
service, but the last thing I wanna do is get
sent off to some other Green Hell.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_000_CUT_000_130.text:
But hey, the president needs a chief
of staff to keep things runnin', right?
So how about ya just keep that seat
warm for little ol' me?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_030.text:
They knew of your strength, and so chose you
to replace us—but the thing they didn't count
on was the power of your spirits.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, that makes two of us! Heck,
the thought of us ever makin'
a decision like this...

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_041.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_041.text:
Still, I was able to walk the same path
as my daddy and fight just like he did,
so maybe that's enough.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_050.text:
And I was able to fight because I had
you with me, Bonnie—so thank you.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_060.text: Heck, you're gonna make me blush.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_070.text:
So long as we have people like you,
the Union States's future will be
secure no matter who is elected
as our next president.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_080.text: You praise us too much, Mr. President.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_090.text:
Would you mind if I took
a little time off, sir?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_120.text: This is where it all started.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_130.text:
Wait, you're not seriously suggesting
that we go in again, are you?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_140.text:
I sure am! Now let's hop in there and find
us a nice ocean to relax on, 'cause I can't
wait to see what you look like in a cute
little swimsuit!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_150.text:
I think I'd prefer a nice meal at a classy
restaurant—plus I'd love to see what you
look like in a nice dress!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_END_100_CUT_000_160.text:
Either way, it sounds like we
got us a vacation to enjoy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, good! There you are! Officers Bonnie Blair
and Formina Franklyn, yes? I am Dr. Nishant,
director of the anti-alien research and
development laboratory.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Darlin', I've got so many questions,
I don't even know where to start.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Let's start here: how do you know about us,
and how did you know we were coming here?
Also, I'd appreciate an overview of the
research you're conducting here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
I heard of you from your boss, Tristan Hernandez.
Seems the man's finally gotten off his duff and
started taking our anti-alien measures seriously,
which means we're about to be VERY busy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: What exactly are you doin' here, doc?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Bonnie, no. We don't have time to
listen to this man's nonsense.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
The first reported contact with aliens was in 1953.
Locals gave food and water to a UFO that crashed
in the desert. Several years later, a mysterious
illness took hold of them, and then—

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, girl. I don't actually give a hoot
about all this alien stuff, but he mentioned
the Major's name, which got me curious.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Another report involved the mutilation of over 300
cattle on a local ranch. Despite the wide variety of
parts removed, only a few of the animals were
thought to have died instantly, and—

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Yes, well! In any event, this research facility
was established to conduct research and
development on equipment that might be
used as countermeasures against the aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
To that end, we devised a simulator
where you can battle aliens in
a virtual environment.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, so y'all have fought enough
aliens that you can simulate 'em?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
We have this because we CAN'T fight them,
Officer Blair. The simulation is culled from
data such as eyewitness reports and unusual
phenomena. Care to give it a try?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Sure, let's fight some weak ones.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Sure, let's fight some average ones.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
All right, what's with this big ol' crowd?
Do they even got the proper permissions
and all that to be usin' the plaza?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Bonnie, look! It's Emily!
Emily Bryant is putting on a show!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_030.text: Emily Bryant! Please don't tell me you've never heard her music.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
If it ain't country, hon, I ain't heard it.
Guess I might'a caught something of hers
passin' a shop or something, though.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Look, just make sure you remember the name
Emily Bryant, because she's about to become
your new favorite artist!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So this here's some kinda corporate tie-in
event, huh? ...Also guess I am sorta takin'
a likin' to her tunes, now that I think on it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_070.text: That's just how good she is.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_080.text: A'yup. Must be somethin' like that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Say, Formina? Is it just me, or does
that crystal in the Capitol building
look like a big ol' Calamity Shard?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_01.text: I can't say. I haven't seen it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, I'm curious as a hungry mouse,
and I wanna get an up-close look.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Then why not apply for a permit from the
Congressional Secretariat? Just say it's
for academic research or something.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Me doing academic research? Ha! It'd be
a fair sight easier to just waltz in there
and steal the durn thing.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
That's quite enough of that talk, Officer!
I'll just assume the Calamity Shard is
having some kind of influence on you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
None here hold appealing darkness;
the light in this city is far too strong for such.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Just a minute now, cowboy. You best not
go causin' any trouble here in Capitol City,
unless you've got a hankerin' to be on the
wrong end of a CCPD boot.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
You stand out enough as it is, Dismal King.
Also, don't think you can get away with
doing whatever you want around here
simply because you're royalty.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
I should like to visit this place again
one day—without the both of you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The International Peace Forum, hmm?
Personally, I don't know how a bunch
of folks chatterin' away in a room is
supposed to keep anything peaceful.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Perhaps not, but have to keep trying.
We only have one chance at this world;
we don't have the luxury of starting
over if something goes wrong.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yeah, it'd sure be great if folks could refrain
from pullin' the proverbial trigger for
reasons that don't make a lick of sense.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I just hope our current mission to track
down the triangle pieces comes to fruition;
I don't care much for the idea of dancing
in the palm of someone else's hand.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Can't say I'm all that upset about dancin'
with you, girl—but if I see anyone givin'
us a smirk, I ain't gonna be happy until
I lay 'em out on the ballroom floor.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Just save some for me, because I have
the feeling you're the type to knock
someone senseless with a single blow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Some weird critter made a nest down here,
and now it's tryin' to turn the good folks
of Capitol City into mushrooms!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
That sounds like a tale I've heard before.
Oh, I DO love dramas with tawdry setups!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Can't reckon Tope would've cared to hear
his life story called a 'tawdry drama.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
But if this manhole really
connects to that world...

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Wouldn't be our responsibility
even if it did.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_000.text: Riding this reminds me of Delta Base.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I possess no such flaw—indeed, I seek only
to experience more fun in the Outside.
Where will you be taking me next?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
We're not tour guides. And if you want
to know where we'll be going next,
ask the triangle pieces.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, but this is exciting! The mystery
of the triangles is truly a big,
important mission!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I'm just glad this ain't an
episode of Mission: Unlikely.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure is nice and cool here. I like that
Capitol City's a dry heat, but hoo-whee
does Mister Sun love to shine down!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
We'd have no reason to come to a nice
hotel like this if we weren't on patrol.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Heck, I reckon your highfalutin parents
could swing a place like this. Didn't they
stay here when they came to Capitol City?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
My parents never wanted to come to Capitol City
for some reason—and they never told me why.
I always assumed something must have happened
to them here when they were young.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, ain't that just a mystery. By the way,
that big ol' tree in the middle of the lobby
is the real deal, if you're curious.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
I know. Apparently it's been a symbol for
the hotel since long before it was rebuilt.
The vitality plants are able to show really
is incredible, don't you think?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure is. You can almost feel the soul
inside it—it's like a stubborn old granny
who keeps on livin' no matter what.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
A fine way to phrase it. Do take
good care of yourself, Granny.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Cathedral_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_00.text: I only just arrived here and can't find the Research Institute. The way the place is built with all the layers? Ugh! Who does that? Where in the world am— Huh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_01.text:
The Research Institute's over there!
And here! And also there!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Take_MiddleSister
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Say there, young fella! Know where I can
find the president's office, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_04.text:
President's office is over there!
And here! And also there!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Take_MiddleSister
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_05.text:
If you wanna waste my time, young man,
I'm gonna need you to buy something.
How about this hemp seed here, hmm?
It's a specialty of Miyako City!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I can't believe I thought he'd make
a good Capitol City tour guide.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You're gonna have to explain how ya
got to that conclusion, darlin'.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, just look at those beautiful
little kitties! Are they yours?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Sort of? It's less that they're 'ours,'
and more that we cohabitate with them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Equal members of the family, then?
Oh, but that's just wonderful.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
More like their colleagues, I reckon.
They scratch our backs and we scratch
theirs—the usual deal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.text:
That sounds like a wonderful relationship.
And you're with the CCPD!
Er, or I suppose you're actually working
for the office of the president right now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.text: Wait, how do you know that?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, I hear all sorts of things while
I'm out here cleaning every morning.
You two keep up the good work now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
And you two have a lovely day as well.
What good little kitties you are!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.text: Ain't we met her somewhere before?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
It definitely feels like it,
but I can't remember where.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, if it isn't our rookie officers!
Or I guess you're actually employees
of the president right now, eh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Hello, Detective. It's been a while.
I'm still really grateful for how you
helped me while I was in training.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, you were a natural talent—just a shame
talented people always end up getting poached!
Still, not much you can do when the Presidential
Security Office comes knocking at your door.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.text:
How's Tristan doing, anyway?
Still cracking the whip?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.text:
He was an instructor at the military academy—
which is why I dropped out and became a cop!
If I'd stuck around and been sent into combat,
I'd be six feet under the dirt right now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.text:
He's a good man, the kind who does whatever it
takes to achieve his goals—including laying down
his own life. But I suppose you two will see that
for yourselves. Anyway, be good.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Have you obtained new information
regarding Tristan Hernandez?

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.text:
I analyzed the detective's background data
and can affirm everything he said as true.
He withdrew from the military academy
at his own discretion.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Guess the Union States' IT security
was no match for you!

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Indeed, the information may as well
have been publicly available.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_12.text:
But can you trust him?
Tristan Hernandez, that is.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_13.text:
I wouldn't have taken on this mission
if I didn't trust his feelings on both
the president and the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_14.text: Then I will continue my analyses.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
You sighed when we returned to the
apartment, Azure. Why was that?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, it's all sand and grit 'round these parts.
But if we hop in a plane and fly for an hour,
you'll be right by the ocean—which is a darn
sight closer to the sea than my hometown.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Azure
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The sun shines brightly. The air is dry.
The salt absent. Truly, this is another
of Deus Maris's trials.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
No, it's simply the basic characteristics
of the climate in this area. You'll just
have to get used to it.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Azure
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_AZURE_000_CUT_000_060.text: Mmm? And what do you want?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Ahhh... Nothin' beats your own
spread for a little R&R.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Your base of operations is rather narrow,
and I fear I burden you. Apologies.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, don't you worry your li'l head about it!
I already asked the Major to get us another
apartment, so everything's gonna be fine.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I... I see. Well, please let me know if
there is aught I can do for you—for
I remain a priest, after all.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_050.text: We'll be counting on you, Byaku.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_060.text: Hmm? What do you need, animals?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_BYAKU_000_CUT_000_070.text: No! Stop! Do not lick me!

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Do you think Alexandre had
anything to do with Quisstatium?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
You sayin' the fact we happened to visit Grelon,
happened to meet Alexandre, and then happened
to get our hands on a triangle piece means it's all
connected somehow?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm just asking the question, Bonnie.
You seemed to view him as a little
brother of sorts, so I was concerned.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
The Twilight Area's connected to infinite worlds,
which means there's an infinite number where them
triangle doohickies might crop up. Our green line
just happened to be one of 'em. That's all.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Just a coincidence, then? Hmm.
I find that rather sad.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_ALEXANDRE_000_CUT_000_.text:
What about you fellers?
Y'all siblings?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_000.text: We're alive and back in our apartment.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Be somethin' of a relief to know for sure
there's a world waitin' for us after we
pass on, though. Don't ya think?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_020.text:
There's no guarantee King Din
will summon us.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_030.text:
And I don't WANT him to! Fightin' forever,
gettin' worn out and ground into dust?
No thanks. Not for this cowgirl.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Guv seemed happy enough, I suppose.
Perhaps there are just some people
who are able to live like that.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Sure, but those people ain't livin'.
Folks in Brighthome are all dead.

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_060.text:
What would happiness look
like for you little ones?

SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_WRLD_BOFO_GUV_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Neck scritches are where your
happiness can be found? Hee hee!
